content.body:
How feasible would it be to embed binary strings inside JS?
Something like `const binary = 17’...binary data...’`, denoting 17 bytes of non-utf binary data.

content.body: I think the spec could be easy enough, but the challenge is making sure browsers don’t run a UTF8 step before letting JS parse.
